transport.question: I have wheels and go 'Vroom Vroom!' What am I?

hints.text: 🛣️ I often travel on roads.
⛽ I need fuel to go.
👨‍👩‍👧‍👦 I can carry people.

transport.question: I float on water and can carry many people. What am I?

hints.text: 🌊 I need a big body of water to move.
⚓ I stop at harbors.
🚢 I am bigger than a rowboat.

transport.question: I have two wheels and you pedal to make me go. What am I?

hints.text: 🚶 You use your legs to make me move.
⛑️ You should wear a helmet when riding me.
🚴 I'm great for exercise!

transport.question: I fly in the sky and take people to far away places. What am I?

hints.text: ☁️ I travel in the air above the clouds.
✈️ I have wings and engines.
💺 Passengers sit inside me.

transport.question: I run on tracks and can carry many people across land. What am I?

hints.text: 🛤️ I follow a special path of metal rails.
📢 I often stop at stations.
🚃 I can have many cars linked together.

transport.question: I take kids to school and stop to pick them up. What am I?

hints.text: 🛑 I am usually yellow.
🎒 I transport students.
🚦I stop to let children on.

transport.question: I have a siren and help people when there's a fire. What am I?

hints.text: 🚨 I am usually red.
🧑‍🚒 Firefighters ride in me.
💦 I spray water to put out fires.

transport.question: I zoom through space and can take astronauts to the moon. What am I?

hints.text: 👩‍🚀 I travel beyond Earth.
🚀 I have powerful engines to escape gravity.
🌕 I can visit other planets.

transport.question: I have a handle and a flat board, you can use me to get around town but you must keep your balance. What am I?

hints.text: 🛹 I have two or four wheels and you stand on me.
🤸 You have to keep your balance.
🏞️ I can be used at a special place for skating.

transport.question: I travel under the city and can take lots of people quickly. What am I?

hints.text: 🚇 I travel underground.
🏙️ I am a fast way to get around a city.
🎫 You need a special ticket to ride me.

ocean.question: I have a shell and move very slowly. What am I?

hints.text: 🏠 I carry my home on my back.
🐌 I'm not a fast animal.
🌿 I can be found in gardens and near the sea.

ocean.question: I am big and blue and hold lots of water. What am I?

hints.text: 🚢 Ships sail on me.
🐳 Many animals live in me.
💧 I'm made of saltwater.

ocean.question: I swim in the ocean and have eight arms. What am I?

hints.text: 🐙 I can change color.
🖐🖐🖐🖐🖐🖐🖐🖐 I have many arms.
💧 I live in the ocean.

ocean.question: I am a large fish with sharp teeth that lives in the ocean. People are sometimes scared of me. What am I?

hints.text: 🦷 I have many of these to eat.
🎬 Jaws is a movie about me.
🌊 I live in saltwater.

ocean.question: I am a colorful fish that lives in coral reefs. What am I?

hints.text: 🐠 I am often small and bright.
🧱 I live near colorful rocks under the sea.
🏡 I can be found in a reef with anemones.

ocean.question: I’m a big sea creature that sings songs and is very smart. What am I?

hints.text: 🐳 I breathe air and live in the sea.
🎶 I make beautiful sounds.
🧠 I'm a marine mammal and have a big brain.

ocean.question: I am a strong, fast current in the ocean, like a river within the sea. What am I?

hints.text: 🌊 I am a flow of water within the ocean.
🌡️ I can affect the temperature of the areas I flow past.
🧭 Ships can use me to travel faster, or to save fuel.

ocean.question: I am made of tiny shells and sand and am found at the edge of the ocean. What am I?

hints.text: 🏖️ People like to play on me and relax.
🐚 I am often light colored.
☀️ You can build a sandcastle on me with a bucket and spade.

ocean.question: I am a small, hard object that can be found inside an oyster. I am often white and shiny and of great value. What am I?

hints.text: 💍 I'm often used in jewelry such as necklaces.
🦪 I grow inside a shellfish in response to an irritant.
✨ I can be very valuable and come in all sizes.

ocean.question: I am a huge wave caused by an earthquake under the sea. What am I?

hints.text: 🌊 I can be very destructive and cause flooding.
🌎 I start with an earthquake or volcanic eruption on the seabed.
⚠️ I am a dangerous wave that can travel thousands of miles.
